title: Nightmare Email Feature
alt: "...just got back and didn't see your message until just now. Sorry! -- TIME THIS MESSAGE SAT HALF-FINISHED IN DRAFTS FOLDER: 3 days, 2 hours, 45 minutes."
transcript:
[A panel with a short email message, with the first line partly obscured by the top of the panel. Below that, in light gray font, is an information message from the email client.]
Enjoyed it! I'm busy this weekend, but let me know if you're free sometime next week and want to get dinner or something.Total time spent revising this email before sending: 47 minutes 12 seconds
...[Caption below the panel:]
My nightmare email feature
